data.lyric:
[ti:forget me too (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/Halsey]
[al:Tickets To My Downfall (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]forget me too (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)/Halsey
[00:00.81]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Ashley Nicolette Frangipane
[00:01.63]Composed by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Long/Colson Baker/Ashley Nicolette Frangipane
[00:02.44]Machine Gun Kelly：
[00:02.50]Let me take my f**king bracelet off
[00:06.34]You want me to forget you
[00:09.57]Okay forget me too
[00:12.55]You tell me you hate me baby
[00:16.01]Yeah I bet you do
[00:28.65]D**n
[00:29.07]I saw you walk in the room and I tried my best
[00:31.47]Not to panic while I'm lookin' for the back door
[00:34.11]I smell the perfume and it's obvious
[00:36.20]I'm gonna stay and put my key in the back more
[00:38.60]I can't I can't I can't pretend to forget you
[00:41.20]The reason I punched a hole in the wall back home
[00:43.34]And then and then
[00:44.64]And then a couple hours later we're in room 29 at The Chateau
[00:48.68]I left before you woke up
[00:53.50]I don't feel right
[00:55.91]See you sober
[00:56.94]You want me to forget you
[00:59.57]Okay forget me too
[01:01.73]You tell me that you hate me baby
[01:04.35]Yeah I bet you do
[01:06.42]I'm keepin' you waitin'
[01:09.06]But I won't wait on you
[01:11.54]Want me to forget you
[01:13.76]Okay forget me too
[01:16.29]Halsey：
[01:17.19]I've wasted so much time
[01:19.27]Waitin' around for your phone calls every night
[01:21.80]My bad dreams are silk screens
[01:23.41]'Cause I taste blood when you bleed
[01:25.17]It's eating me alive
[01:26.78]We'd both be better off alone
[01:29.10]Still think I'd get you on the phone
[01:31.62]With one last breath in me
[01:33.68]I'd die before I let you leave
[01:36.81]You left before I woke up
[01:41.43]Why don't I ever see you sober
[01:44.98]You want me to forget you
[01:47.50]Okay forget me too
[01:49.62]You tell me that you hate me baby
[01:52.28]Yeah I bet you do
[01:54.50]I'm keepin' you waitin'
[01:57.02]But I won't wait on you
[01:59.47]You want me to forget you
[02:01.86]Okay forget me too
[02:04.23]Both：
[02:05.18]Hey you
[02:07.11]Tell me why you do the things that make me hate you
[02:11.73]It's an emotional kaleidoscope when I face you
[02:16.84]Permanent calligraphy I just tattooed your name on me forever
[02:23.43]You want me to forget you
[02:25.86]Okay forget me too
[02:28.23]You tell me that you hate me baby
[02:30.71]Yeah I bet you do
[02:32.94]I'm keepin' you waitin'
[02:35.48]But I won't wait on you
[02:37.77]You want me to forget you
[02:40.27]Okay forget me too
data.trans:
[ti:forget me too (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly/Halsey]
[al:Tickets To My Downfall (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.81]//
[00:01.62]//
[00:02.44]//
[00:02.50]让我摘下我的手链
[00:06.34]你想要我忘记你
[00:09.57]行 你也忘记我吧
[00:12.55]你说你恨我 宝贝
[00:16.01]嗯 我毫不怀疑
[00:28.65]//
[00:29.07]我看到你走进来 我拼尽全力
[00:31.47]不去惊慌 同时很想从后门溜走
[00:34.11]我闻到了香水味 很显然
[00:36.20]我会留下来 把钥匙藏在身后
[00:38.60]我无法假装忘记你
[00:41.20]所以我在家里的墙上砸出了一个洞
[00:43.34]后来
[00:44.64]几个小时后 我们就来到了城堡酒店的29号房
[00:48.68]我在你醒来之前离开了
[00:53.50]我感觉不太好
[00:55.91]看到你很清醒
[00:56.94]你想要我忘记你
[00:59.57]行 你也忘记我吧
[01:01.73]你说你恨我 宝贝
[01:04.35]嗯 我毫不怀疑
[01:06.42]我让你一直等待着
[01:09.06]但我不会等待你
[01:11.54]想要我忘记你
[01:13.76]行 你也忘记我吧
[01:16.29]//
[01:17.19]我浪费了太多时间
[01:19.27]每天晚上都在等你的电话
[01:21.80]我的噩梦让我痛苦不堪
[01:23.41]因为当你痛苦的时候 我也感同身受
[01:25.17]这种感觉快要将我吞没
[01:26.78]我们俩分开会更好
[01:29.10]依然觉得我会给你打电话
[01:31.62]就算只剩最后一口气
[01:33.68]我也不会让你离我而去
[01:36.81]你在我醒来之前离开了
[01:41.43]为何我从未见你清醒过
[01:44.98]你想要我忘记你
[01:47.50]行 你也忘记我吧
[01:49.62]你说你恨我 宝贝
[01:52.28]嗯 我毫不怀疑
[01:54.50]我让你一直等待着
[01:57.02]但我不会等待你
[01:59.47]你想要我忘记你
[02:01.86]行 你也忘记我吧
[02:04.23]//
[02:05.18]嘿 你
[02:07.11]告诉我 为什么你要做这些事情让我恨你
[02:11.73]当我面对你的时候 我的情绪就像万花筒
[02:16.84]我把你的名字纹在了身上 永远不会抹去
[02:23.43]你想要我忘记你
[02:25.86]行 你也忘记我吧
[02:28.23]你说你恨我 宝贝
[02:30.71]嗯 我毫不怀疑
[02:32.94]我让你一直等待着
[02:35.48]但我不会等待你
[02:37.77]你想要我忘记你
[02:40.27]行 你也忘记我吧
